On Apr 27, 2005, at 5:00 AM, OLIVERIO Christophe wrote:

> if I can reformule my demand, I want the detail of the
> troops in the invasion army of the korea :
> the generals, the number and kind of every units
> ( samurais, ashigaru, servants ... )

I guess the Elisonian's article on the Cambridge History of Japan vol.4 
or Turnbull's "Samurai Invasion" should have the most information on 
this topic, but I am not sure they have detailed numbers. And remember 
that Turnbull is seen by many as a amateurish historian.

cepo
